## PolicyLoader.activate() method

Activate the pending policy bundle (if any).

**Signature:**

```typescript
activate(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This is called automatically when a policy bundle update is downloaded, unless [`PolicyLoaderOptions.activateOnLoad`](./embedded-client.policyloaderoptions.activateonload.md) is `false`<!-- -->.
